comments.text:
In case of repeating events the unifinder currently only shows the base/parent/master event instead of the real occurrences if set to all or all future -> bug 310853.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 310853 ***
comments.raw_text: In case of repeating events the unifinder currently only shows the base/parent/master event instead of the real occurrences if set to all or all future -> bug 310853.

I did not report missing repeating events, though I noticed this as well

but I reported that the date of a moved event ( one of repeating ones )
is not shown correctly.

It still shows the old date - a WRONG DATE.

I added a picture which shows the event-seach-bar with wrong information

comments.text: Yes, I understand. But that is what bug 310853 is about. It shows the date (16-09) of the original master event instead of the date (22-09) of the modified occurrence. If you switch to a filter with limited range (e.g. next 14 days) it should display correct.
